title: THE CHRISTMAS SHOW! The Mystery Box Christmas Gift Exchange and We Talk to Mr. Christmas, Brett Eldredge!
itunes:title: THE CHRISTMAS SHOW! The Mystery Box Christmas Gift Exchange and We Talk to Mr. Christmas, Brett Eldredge!
description:
It’s the annual Bobby Bones Christmas show! We have our show gift exchange where we are given a gift that we can accept or pick a mystery box. We talk to Brett Eldredge about his new Christmas album, if he’s planning on recording another one and the poetry he shared on Instagram.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
